snippet.title: Republique Episode 2: "Metamorphosis" -- Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Intense, thrilling, and topical, RÉPUBLIQUE is a stealth-action game that explores the perils of government surveillance in the Internet Age.

Episode 2: "Metamorphosis": http://bit.ly/hopeisalive
Now Available on the App Store

Metamorphosis Library: A stunning new environment that pushes iOS to the limit

Three Mind-Bending Puzzles: Featuring a collaboration with Kostya Stankevych, creator of Blueprint 3D

3D Map: One of the most requested features come to life, enabled for both EP1 and EP2

ARC Prizrak: New guard type with protective armor and randomized patrols to keep you on your toes

New OMNI Abilities: Unlock voyeuristic abilities allowing the visualization of Prizrak through walls and their patrol routes

Improved Performance: Optimized performance gains from Unity 4.5 (most notable on iPhone 4, iPad mini and iPad 2)

Video Documentary Part 3: A candid look at the development of Episode 2, a free download for Season Pass owners

"Special, new, and necessary." - IGN
"A must-play experience in 2014." - Polygon
"Shaping up to be a masterpiece." - Touch Arcade (5/5)
"This is the App Store's next must-have high-end game." - CNET
"Sets a new benchmark for mobile game quality." - The Washington Post

You receive a desperate call from Hope, a mysterious woman trapped inside an oppressive totalitarian state. By hacking into the nation's elaborate surveillance network and taking control, you guide Hope through a web of danger and deception across five thrilling episodes. (Purchase future episodes with the discounted Season Pass.)

Challenging puzzles and complex strategy are offset by the simplicity of the game's "One Touch" controls, developed over two years by industry veterans (Metal Gear Solid 4, Halo 4, F.E.A.R., Black & White 2, SOCOM). 

With striking visuals, a haunting, atmospheric score, and an all-star cast, RÉPUBLIQUE is one of the most ambitious games ever developed for iOS.

FEATURING:

- Pilot Episode 1: "Exordium"
- "One Touch" stealth action gameplay
- Immersive puzzles and strategic choices
- Advanced AI systems
- Motion-captured cutscenes
- Full voiceovers, starring:
- Rena Strober
- David Hayter (Metal Gear Solid)
- Jennifer Hale (Mass Effect, BioShock Infinite)
- Dwight Schultz (Killer7, Star Trek)
- Khary Payton (Metal Gear Solid 4)
- Matthew Mercer (Resident Evil 6)
- Console-quality facial tech powered by Faceware
- OMNI View icon art by Cory Schmitz 
- iOS 7 Leaderboards, Achievements and Gamepad support
- Innovative, interactive developer commentary (in-app purchase)
- Downloadable "The Making of République" video series (in-app purchase)
- Fully translated in English, French, German, Spanish, Russian and Brazilian Portuguese
- Powered by Unity
- Funded by the Kickstarter Community

TECHNICAL NOTES:

- République Minimum Spec Requirements: iPhone 4 & up, iPad 2 & up, 
iPod Touch 5 & up. 
- Close all running apps to improve performance and stability.


ABOUT CAMOUFLAJ LLC:

Founded by former Halo 4 creative director and METAL GEAR SOLID 4 producer Ryan Payton, Camouflaj is a Seattle/Bellevue-based boutique game studio committed to developing games that are deep and broadening, sophisticated and entertaining, and imaginative and international. Comprised of industry veterans from projects including F.E.A.R., UNCHARTED, BATMAN, LORD OF THE RINGS, AND KINECT. 

Camouflaj is building towards an aggressive five-year vision: to create a global, iconic HBO-like video game brand known for meaningful and memorable games. http://camouflaj.com/
